name: Fruiog Fishin
description:
Originally made for LD 39 (to the theme of "Running out of Power") -- just decided to take a few extra days to polish things up a bit.

Your battery's running out fast! Collect fruit and hand it over to the frog king to extend your game time for just a little bit longer. 

Combo fruit together or hand in the favourite fruit of the day for more points, but be careful how much you carry at once or you might have trouble finding your way back in time...

Art/sound/programming by me, Nathan. 
Follow me on twitter at @caffi_nate !!
